diseases.remedy: Dates (nutritive therapy), dietary and humoral measures
diseases.method: Consume beneficial dates (varieties like Ajwa highlighted for protection) and follow heart-strengthening diet
diseases.dose: Traditionally 7 Ajwa dates cited for protection; general daily date consumption supportive
diseases.timing: Morning on an empty stomach suggested for nutritive benefit
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Section XVI: Benefits of Dates
diseases.remedy_description: Dates (e.g., Ajwa) are soft, wrinkled fruits, dark brown in color, with a sweet, caramel-like taste and chewy texture. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Dates

diseases.method: Perform cupping at recommended sites; add humoral-regulating diet and honey as supportive
diseases.dose: Cupping sessions as per traditional schedule; honey 1–2 tbsp as tonic
diseases.timing: Hijama recommended on 17th, 19th, or 21st lunar day; morning; empty stomach
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Hijama and honey entries
diseases.remedy_description: Cupping (hijama) uses small glass or bamboo cups placed on the skin to draw blood; cups are clear or tinted and create suction marks. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Cupping_therapy
